item.title: How REGEX can save your life!
item.description: How REGEX can save your life! You’re probably wondering what REGEX is. You’re probably also wondering why it can save your life. Let me explain: Python Background In the modern digital world it’s impossible to escape technology. It looms over society and has woven its way into the fabric of our culture, because lets face it: we’re all addicted and no one is getting over it any time soon. So, in the meantime, lets learn to adapt by embracing the new digital world!
